select ,dep2.dep_name as parent_Name,dep2.dep_code AS parent_Code from sys_department LEFT JOIN sys_department dep2 ON sys_department.pdep_id = dep2.dep_id
and LOCATE(#{funcCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sys_department.dep_code) > 0
and LOCATE(#{funcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sys_department.dep_name) > 0
and sys_department.dep_state = #{funcState,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and sys_department.dep_state >=0
order by sys_department.dep_order

select ,dep2.dep_name as parent_Name,dep2.dep_code AS parent_Code from sys_department LEFT JOIN sys_department dep2 on sys_department.pdep_id = dep2.dep_id where sys_department.dep_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sys_department.dep_state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select dep_id as depId, dep_code as depCode, dep_name as depName, pdep_id as pdepId from sys_department where pdep_id = '' and dep_state = 0 union select d1.dep_id as depId, d1.dep_code as depCode, d1.dep_name as depName, d1.pdep_id as pdepId from sys_department d1 join sys_department d2 on d1.pdep_id = d2.dep_id where d1.dep_state = 0 and d2.dep_state = 0
